channel.title: Skateboard on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Skateboard on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Why I Like Skateboard
item.description: I’ve been playing skateboard for over a year now, the more I learned it, the more I like it. As I’m getting old, I’d like settle for some hobbies not only for transitory entertainment, but also feed my soul, I can find kindred community, and I can see myself sticking with it for years. It’s challenging and inspiring There is nothing short of inspirational skateboarding videos in internet, either 10 feet deep bowl deep dive or 24 staircases jumping over, I don’t see myself could ever even do it for my life, I don’t want get myself killed for this “bold” challenges, but who knows, I’m just starting out, I will get more confidence, maybe one day I would get boasted to try.
